item.title: Data Logger for Electrical Power Measurements
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description: Foreword Measuring power (consumption or supplied) in certain electric (and electronic) appliances or projects sometimes requires very long running times. Some might even last for days or more. Having a software tool that can reliabily take care of storing the measured data and plot some nice graphs and even export the whole data-set is a great deal of help. Especially when such software can be customized to fulfill any kind of requirements.

item.title: Mobile Apps
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description: For some years I worked with and published mobile apps. Albeit mostly on the iOS Apple platform, I ventured into porting onto Android (JAVA, Kotlin) as well. This post lists the apps I worked on, worth of being published. Make sure you check those open-source ones, as their code is available for download. Modern software programs usually known as Apps… Tip Unless otherwise stated, I took care of designing all the graphical elements of the apps designing the UI/UX creating the promo videos writing/arranging the musics everything else ANTOINE: that little Prince ðŸ¤´ This text reader App implements a pretty new and interactive paradigm to enjoy a written story.

item.title: Theremin
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description: A mighty Theremin build from an open source project powered by an Arduino UNO.
